title: 269-Hans Christian Andersen: What We Do With the Shadows
itunes:title: 269-Hans Christian Andersen: What We Do With the Shadows
description:
A story from Hans Christian Andersen about becoming your best self…after that self completely separates from you and leaves you as merely a shadow.

The creature this time is the invincible bear monster your ghost grandpa warned you about.

—

Scoundrel: All new this week! https://myths.link/scoundrel

Fictional: All new tomorrow! https://fictional.fm/subscribe
